 Earn a Badge 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If this list is too long for the page, you can scroll it left and right 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            #TwitterFlightSchool Video Badge
           
 
              Earn the Twitter Flight School Video Badge by scoring 80% or higher on the Video Badge Assessment. You can test your knowledge by attempting the assessment now or after reviewing the Flight School Video Badge training courses.
             
 
 
 Path 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Rating 4.5
                 
 Advanced 
 
 Award 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            Launch and Connect Badge
           
 
              Earn the Launch and Connect Strategist Badge by scoring 80% or higher on the Launch and Connect assessment. Check out the full catalog of Launch and Connect courses and then test your knowledge to earn your badge!
             
 
 
 Path 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Rating 4.3
                 
 Advanced 
 
 Award 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            Performance Fundamentals Badge
           
 
              Earn the Performance Fundamentals Badge by scoring 80% or higher on the Performance Fundamentals assessment. Check out the full catalog of Performance Advertising courses and then test your knowledge to earn your badge!
             
 
 
 Path 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Rating 5.0
                 
 Advanced 
 
 Award 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 #FirstLooks 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If this list is too long for the page, you can scroll it left and right 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            #FirstLook: Fleets
           
 
              Fleets are a new way to share what you're seeing and thinking about right now. In this course, we'll introduce you to Fleets, Twitter's new storytelling tool, and show you how to get started creating them for yourself.
             
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            #FirstLook: App Installs
           
 
              We've been working hard to improve our App Install Ads to help you create more efficient, performance-driven campaigns on Twitter. This course will introduce you to our improved App Install Ads and walk you through creating your first campaign.
